title: AIIMS Rajkot Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 28 Junior Resident Posts
description: The All India Institute of Medical Sciences Rajkot (AIIMS Rajkot) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 28 Junior Residents, Senior Program Coordinator, and Technical Officer Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can also apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, MBBS, MBA, Post-graduation, and Ph.D. can apply for the AIIMS Rajkot Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online m...
